issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

3g iphone 3.1.3, ipod 4gt 4.3, Apr 11 2011 17:20 rcb9c6dc4. New to 1.7.0

  1. Log in/log out test case
  2. force dialog: false
  3. tap log in button
  4. hit cancel on resulting dialog
  5. Tap Base UI

results: contents of base UI are now blank

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: facebook - canceling log in and returning app results in BaseUI Tab loading blank window

comments.body: Unable to reproduce as of 887b93da, with either 'force dialog: true' or 'force dialog: false', clicking on cancel/accept, disabling app access, refusing app access, enabling app access, etc.
closing as we are not able to reproduce using master (1.9.0 Feb 9 2012 09:46 rd47ce8a4)
